describe: Angola is a country located on the west coast of Southern Africa. It is known for its rich cultural heritage, diverse ecosystems, and a history marked by Portuguese colonization and a long civil war. The country is rich in natural resources, particularly oil and diamonds, and has a rapidly growing economy.

cities.name: üèù Luanda
cities.geographical_location: Located on the Atlantic coast in the northwest of Angola.
cities.climate: Luanda has a tropical savanna climate with a dry season from May to October and a wet season from November to April.
cities.famous_cuisine: Calulu, Moamba de Galinha, and Funge.

cities.name: üèù Benguela
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the west coast of Angola, south of Luanda.
cities.climate: Benguela has a semi-arid climate with mild temperatures and low rainfall.
cities.famous_cuisine: Grilled fish, Moamba de Galinha, and Cocada Amarela.

cities.name: üèî Lubango
cities.geographical_location: Located in the south of Angola, surrounded by mountains.
cities.climate: Lubango has a subtropical highland climate with mild temperatures and distinct wet and dry seasons.
cities.famous_cuisine: Chikwanga, Kizaca, and various grilled meats.
